Html:
Hello,
since LUP was not update for some years and is not compatible with WSUS 4.0 and Server 2k12 we want to move on and migrate our system to WPP.

Are there some things I should consider?
Will I be able to see the updates which were published by LUP?

Thank you in advance.

Hi,
Are there some things I should consider?
Nothing special.
Will I be able to see the updates which were published by LUP?
Yes. If you have used a trigger to make yours package visible in the Wsus console, remenber to tick the option "Show Locally-Published updates that are also visible in Wsus Console" in the "Updates" tab.
